actions.name: Shadow Dance
actions.description: Effect: The user's SPD stat is increased by 50% and the user has +2 default SPD Stages in Gloomy Weather. The user is considered Dark Type for the effects of Gloomy Weather.

system.description: Effect: The user's SPD stat is increased by 50% and the user has +2 default SPD Stages in Gloomy Weather. The user is considered Dark Type for the effects of Gloomy Weather.
